TopicTitle: German WW II ME P-1106 Fighter Jet

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys, here's my recreation of the ME P-1106 fighter test platform. It's tail is wrong, it should be in a v formation instead of flat but I can't seem to get the aerodynamics to work with it like that. Other than that, it's a fairly good representation of the original. I'll post a link to a picture of the test platform as well as the pics of the plane I built.

Link to Luft 46's info on the plane: http://www.luft46.com/mess/mep1106.html
